subject: Re: That's Why!
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
For me, the Spirit Box prototype many times acts differently when I 
get it out of my house and at certain purportedly haunted locations.  
Two places I experimented with it at were very active, and the number 
of messages I received at each place were astounding to me (over 20 
from each location).  A not-so active place gleaned only 4-6 messages 
(I don't really keep the "yes," "no," "hi," etc short, one-word 
messages too often as evidence).  

I am pretty pleased with the results of the prototype, though I was 
told by some it wouldn't work the way we had built it and almost 
scrapped it (I formerly hated the FM band as well).    

LC
